title: [Sonreeva, Hall of the Dead]
description: Upon the moss-covered limestone walls, shallow niches house a number of urns.  Iron sconces give off a pale green illumination, giving the hall an eerie presence.  Smeared trails of blood and gore lead in every direction.  Lengths of tattered cloth are scattered across the floor.
paths: Obvious exits: north, northeast, east, southeast, south, southwest, west, northwest
